docs.snippet: The U.S. oil and gas industry on Wednesday welcomed President-elect Donald Trump's choice of former Texas Governor Rick Perry to head the U.S. Department of Energy, and wasted no time making its first specific request of him: to support increased ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. oil and gas industry on Wednesday welcomed President-elect Donald Trump's choice of former Texas Governor Rick Perry to head the U.S. Department of Energy, and wasted no time making its first specific request of him: to support increased exports of America's natural gas overseas.

headline.main: U.S. Oil Industry Cheers Trump Energy Pick, Seeks Gas Export Boost
headline.print_headline: U.S. Oil Industry Cheers Trump Energy Pick, Seeks Gas Export Boost

docs.snippet: "Pokemon Go," the iPhone7 and Donald Trump are among Google's top trending searches globally of 2016. But, in the U.S., no subject ranked higher than Powerball....
docs.lead_paragraph: "Pokemon Go," the iPhone7 and Donald Trump are among Google's top trending searches globally of 2016. But, in the U.S., no subject ranked higher than Powerball.

docs.snippet: A longshot bid to deny Donald Trump the presidency suffered another setback Wednesday after a federal judge rejected an effort by two Democratic electors from Washington state to avoid being fined if they ignore the results of the state's popular ...
docs.lead_paragraph: A longshot bid to deny Donald Trump the presidency suffered another setback Wednesday after a federal judge rejected an effort by two Democratic electors from Washington state to avoid being fined if they ignore the results of the state's popular vote.

headline.main: Judge Rejects Washington Electors' Attempt to Avoid Fine
headline.print_headline: Judge Rejects Washington Electors' Attempt to Avoid Fine
